text:
As customers look to innovate with the cloud,
AWS is focused on helping you grow your business

by enabling your organization to securely
run a wide range of applications.

Our customers shared with us key reasons why
they choose AWS to build and run their applications:

First, AWS is the most secure and reliable
cloud for virtually any application.

Second, AWS delivers the most capabilities
to build and run your applications
today and tomorrow.

Third, AWS constantly innovates to deliver
more performance and lower costs
helping you get the most value from your infrastructure.

And finally, AWS brings cloud capabilities
wherever you need it
in the cloud, on-premises, or at the edge.

Now, let’s hear what an AWS customer has
to say.

At Starbucks we set out to build two things
for AWS to help us solve:
One, our rewards platform.

And the main reason we did that is to control
our own destiny versus using a vendor

and we knew AWS would be able to give us the scale
in the cloud-first design that we wanted.

And the second one being our commerce platform
so if anybody’s ever mobile ordered from

their app at Starbucks, the entire engine
behind that we’ve built on AWS.

Coffee, it’s a pretty simple thing but it’s
also a really important part of people’s life.

And so, we want the technology to be out of
the way for the customer but make it an easy
experience and trust again that it’s reliant.
So, how do we deliver performance, security,
and innovation together?

AWS offers advanced capabilities to protect
your most sensitive data

and significantly more security, compliance,
and governance capabilities
than any other cloud provider.

The AWS Nitro System, the foundation of our
modern compute infrastructure
provides built-in security at the chip level.

It offers unparalleled performance by offloading
the overhead from virtualization
to give more resources for your applications.

And the Nitro System gives us more flexibility to
design and deliver new EC2 instances more quickly,
enabling you to innovate faster.

AWS offers more than 200 services, over 575
compute instances,

and the broadest range of serverless compute, 
storage and networking options
so you can find the right fit for your workload.

AWS has extensive experience in designing
processors and chips optimized for the cloud.

This helps deliver the best price performance
so you can get the most value for your investments.

Additionally, AWS has more services than any
other cloud provider
to help build hybrid architectures

so you can easily run your
applications anywhere
in the cloud, on-premises, or at the edge.

And with IoT, 5G, High Performance Computing,
robotics, and quantum technologies,
AWS is building the future of computing for you.

Discover why customers count on AWS to securely
build and run their applications.
